data.name: Nodes Demo
data.detailed_description:
Nodes is an upcoming 2D RPG game filled with friends and unforgiving enemies.

You play as an unnamed character with a mysterious creator. You start by waking up in an unfamiliar blank void, wielding no clear purpose, only to be released into a colourless world inhabited by many different flat characters.

Features

-Party Members
Almost everything is better together.
-Bullets
Dodge bullets on a board.
-Simple Ink Visuals
Strange flat characters inhabiting a simple world.
-Battle System
A battle system where you dodge bullets raining down from nearly any where on screen.
-Unique art style
Experience a world lacking colour, but beaming with charm.
-Woah that's a lot of Items
Around 40 different weapons, armour, and items to collect. All with their own unique abilities.

data.short_description: An RPG where you control a stickman
